plot: Residents of a small community fight for clean drinking water as the contaminated soil of an old manufacturing plant continues leaking dangerous toxins into ground more than twenty years after the threat was first reported to the EPA.
title: My Toxic Backyard
plot_es: Residents of a small community fight for clean drinking water as the contaminated soil of an old manufacturing plant continues leaking dangerous toxins into ground more than twenty years after the threat was first reported to the EPA.
